dublin_core.dcvalue: Internet based applications are becoming more common in our modern world While electronic health records EHR are available for patients and health care providers outside of Germany most of the available data on EHR address only monetary advantages This study explores whether or not internet based communication between family physicians FP and patients is as safe as traditional oral communication and if it may lead to further benefits
[Both patients and physicians benefit from internet-based communication (APIKAP study)].
